alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 4:27PM CDT until June 24 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central St. Tammany Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Pearl River County in southern Mississippi... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 427 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Picayune, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Picayune. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
